Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.turn

Class TurnManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.turn.TurnManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConstructionManager, MovementManager
public abstract class TurnManager
extends java.lang.Object
This class models the concept of a turn flow manager. It implements a State Pattern in which the game flow is controlled by specific subclasses for every particular moments of the game.
Author:
AndreaAltomare

  • Method Details

    • handle

      public abstract boolean handle​(Move move, Worker worker) throws WinException, LoseException, RunOutMovesException, BuildBeforeMoveException, WrongWorkerException, TurnOverException, TurnSwitchedException
      Handles a move made within the actual Turn (represented by a TurnManager subclass).
      Parameters:
      move - Move to handle
      worker - Worker which made the move
      Returns:
      True if the move was actually executed and thus correctly handled
      Throws:
      WinException - Exception thrown when a Player wins after executing the move
      LoseException - Exception thrown when a Player loses after executing the move
      RunOutMovesException - Exception thrown when the move is not executed because the Player run out of moves
      BuildBeforeMoveException - Exception thrown when the move is not executed because the Player tried to illegally make a Construction before a Movement
      WrongWorkerException - Exception thrown when the move is not executed because the Player made the move with a different Worker than the last one chosen
      TurnOverException - Exception thrown when a Player's Turn is over after the move is executed
      TurnSwitchedException - Exception thrown when a Player's Sub-Turn (Movement / Construction) is over after the move is executed

    • getMovesLeft

      public abstract int getMovesLeft()
      Gets the number of moves left for the actual Turn (represented by a TurnManager subclass).
      Returns:
      Actual Turn moves left

    • notifyObservers

      public void notifyObservers​(Move move, Worker worker) throws LoseException
      Notify Observers when a Move is performed.
      Parameters:
      move - (Move performed)
      worker - (Worker who has performed the Move)
      Throws:
      LoseException - (Exception handled by Controller)

    • registerObservers

      public void registerObservers​(TurnObserver observer)
      Register an Observer for a specific Turn state.
      Parameters:
      observer - (Observer to be registered)

    • unregisterObservers

      public void unregisterObservers​(TurnObserver observer)
      Unregister an Observer for a specific Turn state.
      Parameters:
      observer - (Observer to be unregistered)

    • state

      public StateType state()
      Returns:
      The State Type of the actual state for this Turn
